description:
Falling Number is a super addictive puzzle game with a minimalistic and elegantly designed approach, which will entertain you for hours and relieve stress with fun.

The goal is to drag and drop blocks to create or unlock new numbered blocks. The challenge increases gradually with faster and larger numbered blocks, such as 1024 -> 2048 -> 4096, and so on to infinity.

Enjoy this amazing new puzzle game while improving your memory, concentration, and reflexes at the same time.
name: Falling Number
